trans-unit.target:
Dear %firstName%,

Transport Talent wants to provide the best service for your next career move. To ensure we only approach you with relevant offers, we heavily rely on your profile information. We noticed that your profile is missing the following details:

Click here to add the information to your profile. We really thank you for taking the time.

Kind regards,

Your team at Transport Talent

Dear %firstName%,

Your password has been changed successfully. You can now login at transporttalent.com by using the new password. If you did not change your password and suspect that your account may have been hacked, please contact us at info@transporttalent.com.

Kind regards,

Your team at Transport Talent

If you want to change the settings for your job alert, please go to your profile.

Kind regards,

Your team at Transport Talent

Dear %firstName%,

Your job alert has been set up successfully. The following specifics apply:

Dear %firstName%,

Your job alert has been deleted/deactivated. We hope that you have found the position you were looking for. New job alerts can always be set up in your profile. Please let us know if there is anything we can improve about our job alerts to further support your search.

Kind regards,

Your team at Transport Talent

Dear %firstName%,

Are you still looking for interesting positions from the Transport and Logistics industry? We noticed that you haven’t used/logged in to Transport Talent for some time. Below we have collected some interesting job ads for you:

%renderedJobs%
See who else is currently hiring
Read our latest blog article: “[Title]”

Stay tuned by following us on Facebook, Twitter, or LinkedIn.

Please do not hesitate to contact us should you have any questions. We are always happy to help.

Kind regards,

Your team at Transport Talent

Dear %firstName%,

Your application for %jobTitle% has successfully been forwarded to %companyName%. Please find attached the CV we handed in with your message. The application details have also been saved to your profile.

Your message to %companyName%:

%applicationMessage%

What happens next?

%companyName% will review your application and contact you directly in case of questions. You can keep track of your application status via your profile. Please note that Transport Talent cannot provide information regarding your application status. All questions should be directed to %companyName%. The responsible contact person in the HR department is: %employerContact%. Once the application process is finished you will be notified about the results via email.

Thank you for using Transport Talent and good luck with your application.

Kind regards,

Your team at Transport Talent
Your password for Transport Talent has been changed
Help us find interesting positions for you
Your job alert has been deactived/deleted
